message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its unique nature, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I understand the value of the product, I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is closer to my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I appreciate your response. I am still unable to meet at $12,000. Would $11,000 be within your consideration?
